full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================================

**Project Title:** RFQ TerraCanada - Regulatory and Security Science Main - Architectural and Engineering Services

**Request for Qualification (RFQ) No:** WS3790208446

**Publication Date:** January 13, 2023
**Closing Date:** March 1, 2023 at 14:00:00 EST

**Background:**
As part of the Laboratories Canada (LC) Initiative, the Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PSPC) invites qualified respondents to participate in the provision of professional services for two major laboratory facility projects.

**Objectives:**

* To qualify respondents for the provision of architectural and engineering services for the Laboratories Canada TerraCanada Science and Innovation Hub National Capital Area (TC NCA) and the Laboratories Canada Regulatory and Security Science National Capital Area Main project (RSS NCA Main)
* To invite qualified respondents to participate in the Request for Proposal (RFP) phase of the solicitation

**Scope:**
The requested services include:

* Architectural and engineering services for the design, construction, and commissioning of laboratory facilities
* Compliance with relevant laws and regulations

**Selection Criteria:**

* Variations or combinations of evaluation methods may be used to select the respondents
* Evaluation will be based on the respondents' capabilities, quality of services, and compliance with laws and regulations

**Eligibility:**

* Respondents must be qualified to provide architectural and engineering services
* Respondents must comply with laws and regulations

**Notice URL:**
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15125210?extsite=MTUxMjUyMTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact Information:**

* Anja Ramenason (SPAC/PSPC)
* (613)1333-3333 (phone) (optional)
* anja.ramenason@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca (email) (optional)
* Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
* Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* Canada.____
